title: "A Consolation Constellation" - with Amy Vorpahl
itunes:title: "A Consolation Constellation" - with Amy Vorpahl
description:
Amy Vorphal joins us this week to share some tales from the table and discuss her upcoming album, plus stay tuned until the end for a special musical treat.

Amy's Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/amyvorpahl/behold-her-dreams-musical-album-from-amy-vorpahl?ref 

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
